Title: 21 Bridges
Writer: Adam Mervis (screenplay by), Matthew Michael Carnahan (screenplay by), Adam Mervis (story by)
Actors: Chadwick Boseman, Sienna Miller, J.K. Simmons, Stephan James
Plot: An embattled NYPD detective is thrust into a citywide manhunt for a pair of cop killers after uncovering a massive and unexpected conspiracy.
